Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class ModelBuilder

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.ModelBuilder
public class ModelBuilder extends Object
ModelBuilder class populates a Model instance with the correct number of pawns for each player. If a match is resumed from a saved JSON file, this class correctly setups the Model instance

  • Field Summary

    private boolean
    allCharacterCards
    Boolean, true if the ModelBuilder has to load all the Character Cards

    Maps the number of students to move with the number of players
